objectives: Students will discuss food and dining out using Expert/Academic register language
Students will engage with Mystery/Detective themed scenarios related to food and dining out
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of expert level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining food and dining out content with Mystery/Detective narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore food and dining out through a Mystery/Detective lens using Expert/Academic language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a mysterious problem to solve involving food and dining out

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice expert register vocabulary related to food and dining out in a mystery context
Students engage in mystery themed role-play about food and dining out using expert register
Students create original mystery themed content about food and dining out in expert register

discussion_questions: How would you describe food and dining out in a Mystery/Detective scenario?
What clue or investigation might be involved in food and dining out?
Can you create a Mystery/Detective story about food and dining out?
How does food and dining out change when viewed through a Mystery/Detective perspective?
What expert register expressions would you use to discuss this mystery scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Mystery/Detective situation involving food and dining out
roles: Character A: Using expert register in mystery context
Character B: Responding in expert register within mystery theme

topic_genre_blend: food and dining out with clue
food and dining out with investigation
food and dining out with suspect

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Expert/Academic throughout: Scholarly, technical, high-level discourse
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Mystery/Detective theme: Investigation, puzzles, solving problems

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Expert/Academic register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Mystery/Detective themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of expert register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
